sign_in.hi: Oh, hi ðŸ‘‹! Good to have you.
sign_in.why: Sign in to unleash all features of the editor and to share your presentation online.
sign_in.additionally: Additionally, push the source code of your slides to repos with the GitHub {0} logging.

settings.un_publish: Please note that currently, the presentations you have shared are not automatically removed from internet. If you wish to un-publish them, drop us a message on one of our {0} channels.

dashboard.try: You can try right now our editor for slides but, we will kindly ask you to {0} after three slides. We think it's safer that way, because your content is saved in the cloud.
dashboard.no_slides: You don't have any slides yet. Go for it, create your first deck now!

editor.header_footer_sign_in: Oh, hi! Users' settings are the options for the header and footer. Therefore, if you wish to give a try to this feature, please {0}.
editor.header_footer_edit: Your custom and predefined (Twitter, etc.) options can be edited in your {0}.
editor.history_details: The editor keeps track of the last 10 images you would have use in any of your presentations. Select one to add it again quickly.
editor.no_images: You have not used any images so far.

offline.why: Low bandwidth? Have to jump in a plane? Or want to present without internet connections?
offline.turn: Turn DeckDeckGo {0} to store your presentation locally.
offline.still_edit: You are still going to be able to {0} your slides further.
offline.hang_on_gather: Hang on, we are gathering the content.
offline.oopsie: Oopsie, you are not online yet.
offline.check: Check your online connection, refresh your browser and try again!
offline.note: Please note that the upload of this deck will {0} its previous online version.
offline.long_story: Long story short, your local presentation is going to be uploaded and saved in the database as the good one.
offline.hang_on_upload: Hang on still, we are uploading the content.
offline.error_offline: Apologies, something went wrong and app was unable to go offline.
offline.error_online: Something went wrong. Double check your internet connection and try again. If it still does not work, contact us!

publish_done.share: {0} it with the world, your colleagues, friends and community.
publish_done.source_processing: The source code of the presentation is processing {0}

publish_edit.publish: Publish your presentation to share it with the world, your colleagues, friends and community.
publish_edit.modern_app: DeckDeckGo will distribute it online as a modern app.
publish_edit.title_edit: Edit or review your presentation's title, summary and add or change tags (up to 5) to make your presentation more inviting to readers.
publish_edit.title_max_chars: The title should be provided with latin characters, arabic numerals, spaces and dash. It must not be longer than 45 characters.
publish_edit.social_card: DeckDeckGo will automatically generate the social card for your presentation based on the first slide of your deck.
publish_edit.error_previous: Previous publication attempt failed. You can try again. If the problem persists, please {0} us.

publish_edit.hang_on_publishing: Hang on, we are publishing your presentation
publish_edit.source_push: Push the source code of the presentation to a new public repository of your GitHub account?
